article.title: WareOnEarth to Support High-Performance Computing Management Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: WareOnEarth Communications Incorporated, North Charleston, South Carolina, was awarded a $12 million cost-plus-fixed-fee and firm-fixed-price indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract modification to provide operations and maintenance services in support of the High- Performance Computing Management Program, Defense Research and Engineering Network. The U.S. Army Test and Evaluation Command, Mission Support Contracting Activity, Fort Hood, Texas, is the contracting activity.
